question: The "Trafalgar Falls" is located in which country?
explanation: Trafalgar Falls is located in the Morne Trois Pitons National Park in the island country of Dominica, officially the Commonwealth of Dominica, in the Windward Islands of the Lesser Antilles Archipelago. This falls is surrounded by thick rainforests vegetation and consists of Papa Falls and Mama Falls both form the tributaries of the Roseau River. It is one of the most visited sights on the island.
